        public boolean isUserInPioneerGroup(java.lang.String userName)
        Checks whether the groupId for the provided user is the same as the first person to successfully login
        Parameters:
        userName - The user to check
        Returns:
        TRUE if the groupIds match

      • saveUserGroup

        public void saveUserGroup(java.lang.String userName,
                          java.lang.String password,
                          LoginResponseData userInfo)
        Saves the a user's groupId and password in . GroupId and password are not saved if groupId could not be found in userInfo
        Parameters:
        userName - The username you want to save the password and groupId
        password - The user's password
        userInfo - The user's info from the endpoint (should contain the {team}.{team}.{uuid} key)
